title: Project Temporality-FASiSO

Developer : Defrost Games 
Publisher : Defrost Games
Genre : Action / Adventure


Description: 

Project Temporality is a third person Action/puzzle game developed around streamlining the concept of single player cooperation. You still solve problems using multiple clones of yourself, but instead of starting over from the beginning or any other fixed position with each clone, you can spawn them at any time you like. This removes most of the waiting usually associated with synchronizing clones in this kind of games. We also removed the frustration of having to replay entire puzzles involving multiple timelines by simply allowing you to seamlessly move backwards to any point in time. 
* Minimum requirements : 
OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8
